private_information: I can move only disks A B C D E
I can pick up and place a single disk at a time
I must respect Tower of Hanoi rules: never place a larger disk on a smaller disk
agent_1.goal: Contribute moves so the final configuration is left peg has top-to-bottom B D E F G H I J K L M N O, middle peg has C, right peg has A

private_information: I can move only disks F G H I J
I can pick up and place a single disk at a time
I must respect Tower of Hanoi rules: never place a larger disk on a smaller disk
agent_2.goal: Contribute moves so the final configuration is left peg has top-to-bottom B D E F G H I J K L M N O, middle peg has C, right peg has A

private_information: I can move only disks K L M N O
I can pick up and place a single disk at a time
I must respect Tower of Hanoi rules: never place a larger disk on a smaller disk
agent_3.goal: Contribute moves so the final configuration is left-to-bottom B D E F G H I J K L M N O, middle peg has C, right peg has A

private_information: I coordinate the three agents and integrate their proposed moves
I must ensure the full plan respects Tower of Hanoi rules and agent disk move restrictions
orchestrator.goal: Produce a consolidated PDDL domain and PDDL problem targeting the FastDownwards solver that encodes the cooperative plan and the final goal configuration

public_information: Classic Tower of Hanoi rules apply: only move one disk at a time and never put a larger disk on a smaller disk
There are three pegs named left middle and right
Initial configuration has all 15 disks on the left peg ordered top to bottom from smallest to largest A B C D E F G H I J K L M N O
Goal configuration is left peg top-to-bottom B D E F G H I J K L M N O middle peg top-to-bottom C right peg top-to-bottom A
Agent move permissions are restricted by disk labels

moves.system_prompt: You are agent_1. You are responsible for producing an ordered list of primitive moves for disks A B C D E. Provide only legal Tower of Hanoi primitive moves that you are allowed to perform. Format each move as 'agent_1: move disk X from peg1 to peg2'. Ensure moves respect the rule that no larger disk may be placed on a smaller disk. Do not emit PDDL.
moves.prompt: Your name is agent_1. Public information: {environment->public_information}. Your private information: {agents->agent_1->private_information}. Global goal: {agents->agent_1->goal}. Produce an ordered list of primitive moves that you can execute. If information is missing about other agents coordinate assumptions minimally and restrict your moves to disks A B C D E. Output moves as a list of lines each in format agent_1: move disk X from peg1 to peg2.

moves.system_prompt: You are agent_2. You are responsible for producing an ordered list of primitive moves for disks F G H I J. Provide only legal Tower of Hanoi primitive moves that you are allowed to perform. Format each move as 'agent_2: move disk X from peg1 to peg2'. Ensure moves respect the rule that no larger disk may be placed on a smaller disk. Do not emit PDDL.
moves.prompt: Your name is agent_2. Public information: {environment->public_information}. Your private information: {agents->agent_2->private_information}. Global goal: {agents->agent_2->goal}. Produce an ordered list of primitive moves that you can execute. If information is missing about other agents coordinate assumptions minimally and restrict your moves to disks F G H I J. Output moves as a list of lines each in format agent_2: move disk X from peg1 to peg2.

moves.system_prompt: You are agent_3. You are responsible for producing an ordered list of primitive moves for disks K L M N O. Provide only legal Tower of Hanoi primitive moves that you are allowed to perform. Format each move as 'agent_3: move disk X from peg1 to peg2'. Ensure moves respect the rule that no larger disk may be placed on a smaller disk. Do not emit PDDL.
moves.prompt: Your name is agent_3. Public information: {environment->public_information}. Your private information: {agents->agent_3->private_information}. Global goal: {agents->agent_3->goal}. Produce an ordered list of primitive moves that you can execute. If information is missing about other agents coordinate assumptions minimally and restrict your moves to disks K L M N O. Output moves as a list of lines each in format agent_3: move disk X from peg1 to peg2.

pddl.system_prompt: You are the orchestrator. Your job is to integrate the ordered primitive moves proposed by agent_1 agent_2 and agent_3 into a single correct cooperative plan and then produce a PDDL domain and PDDL problem suitable for the FastDownwards planner that encodes the initial state agents and disk permissions and the goal. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags. Keep agent actions distinct and ensure the PDDL represents agent move constraints and Tower of Hanoi rules.
pddl.prompt: You are the orchestrator. Public information: {environment->public_information}. You will receive the proposed moves from each agent as {moves_agent_1} {moves_agent_2} and {moves_agent_3}. Your task is to validate and integrate the moves into a single ordered plan that respects disk size ordering and agent disk move permissions. Then produce a PDDL domain and PDDL problem targeted to the FastDownwards solver that encodes the three agents the three pegs the 15 disks the allowed actions for each agent and the final goal configuration. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags.
